title._content: Pat Nixon Receives the Annual Live Thanksgiving Turkey, 11/23/1971

description._content: Original Caption: Pat Nixon Receives the Annual Live Thanksgiving Turkey, 11/23/1971 U.S. National Archives’ Local Identifier: WHPO-7844-26A From: Series : Nixon White House Photographs, compiled 01/20/1969 - 08/09/1974, documenting the period 08/08/1968 - 08/09/1974 Collection RN-WHPO: White House Photo Office Collection (Nixon Administration), 01/20/1969 - 08/09/1974 Created By: General Services Administration.
